text: Aberdaria is a monotypic genus of East African dwarf spiders containing the single species, Aberdaria ligulata. It was first described by Å. Holm in 1962, and has only been found in Kenya. ==See also== * List of Linyphiidae species ==References== Category:Linyphiidae Category:Monotypic Araneomorphae genera Category:Spiders of Africa
title: Aberdaria
